questions: Give one difference between renewable and non-renewable resources. [Board Term-I, (CB4QHT
answers: Renewable : Replenished by nature and may be overused e.g., crops and plants. Non-renewable : which get exhausted after years of use. e.g., crude oil.  1

answers: Human beings, flora, fauna, fisheries, livestock, etc.
